text:
NAEB NETWORK HEADQUARTERS
14 Gregory Hall
Urbane. Illinois
June 7, 1955
MEMOs
To: Stations Receiving FRENCH FOR GRADE 3
Proms Network Headquarters
Res Program #3 of FRENCH FOR GRADE 3
Please notes
THE PROGRAM MARKED #7 ON THE COPIES OF FRENCH FOR GRADE 3
WHICH YOU RECEIVED IS NOT PROGRAM #7.
IT IS THE SPECIAL CHRISTINAS PROGRAM WHICH IS INCLUDED IN
THE SERIES.
TWO MORE REELS IN THIS SERIES WILL BE SENT TO YOU.
ONE WILL HAVE THE ACTUAL PROGRAM #7 PLUS PROGRAM #8.
THE OTHER WILL HAVE THE SPECIAL CHRISTMAS PROGRAM.
When you have received these two reels and erased the
reel you now have which is marked ie#7 and you will have a
complete set of tapes of the series FRENCH FOE GRADE 3*
We expect to send the two reels within the next two weeks.
Sincerely 9
JHswc
